statement.p: What is the solution to \displaystyle{10}={2}{x}+{8}? Preview Question 1 Â

solution.p: \displaystyle{10}={2}{x}+{8}. We undo the \displaystyle+{8} by subtracting from both sides.
\displaystyle{2}={2}{x}. We undo the multiplication by \displaystyle{2} by dividing by \displaystyle{2} on both sides.
